title: Show blank dashboard until hardware connects and sends data

requirements.text: Add a 'hardware connected' flag to the backend state. This flag starts as false. When real sensor data is received via the hardware POST API endpoint, set the flag to true. Expose a query function (e.g., isHardwareConnected) that returns this boolean so the frontend can check connection status.

quotes: once i connect with hardware then only data shld be showed on software till tht it is blank

acceptanceCriteria: Backend has an isHardwareConnected query that returns false by default
When hardware POSTs sensor data, the flag is set to true
Flag persists across queries once set to true

requirements.text: Update the frontend dashboard to show a blank/empty waiting state on all panels (SensorDataPanel, AIDecisionPanel, EnergyFlowDiagram, AnalyticsCharts, SimulationControl) when the backend isHardwareConnected flag is false. Display a centered placeholder message such as 'Waiting for hardware connection...' with a subtle pulsing indicator. Once hardware connects and the flag becomes true, render all panels normally with live data. Poll the isHardwareConnected status every 3 seconds using React Query.

quotes: once i connect with hardware then only data shld be showed on software till tht it is blank

acceptanceCriteria: When isHardwareConnected is false, all data panels are hidden and replaced with a 'Waiting for hardware connection...' placeholder
The placeholder uses the existing dark neon industrial theme (dark background, amber/cyan accent text, pulsing animation)
When isHardwareConnected becomes true, all dashboard panels render with live sensor data
Frontend polls isHardwareConnected every 3 seconds and automatically reveals panels without requiring a page refresh
The SimulationControl (manual advance) is also hidden in the waiting state so users cannot inject fake data before hardware connects

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
The hardware POST API endpoint behaviour must not be changed — only add the connection flag tracking on top of it
The blank state must respect the existing industrial neon visual theme
nonGoals: Do not change the simulated data generation logic in the backend
Do not add a manual 'connect hardware' button — the flag must only be set by real hardware POST data
Do not alter any existing chart, panel, or flow diagram component logic beyond hiding/showing them
